body:
## Presentation

**phpBeanstalkdAdmin** is a monitoring and administration interface for [Beanstalkd](http://kr.github.com/beanstalkd/).

It aims to support basic functionalities of Beanstalkd in order to help development and monitoring in production.

![phpBeanstalkdAdmin screenshot](https://github.com/mnapoli/phpBeanstalkdAdmin/raw/master/docs/screenshot.png)

## Installation

### Prerequisites

* Apache server
* PHP version >= 5.3

### Set up

* Download the sources
* Publish it on the Apache server. For example, add a symbolic link in the Apache root folder pointing to `phpBeanstalkdAdmin/public` folder.

Example on linux or Mac OS X:

    ln -s /path/to/phpBeanstalkdAdmin/public /var/www/phpbeanstalkdadmin

phpBeanstalkdAdmin is now accessible at [http://localhost/phpbeanstalkdadmin/](http://localhost/phpbeanstalkdadmin/) (change "localhost" by your server name if necessary).

## Development

phpBeanstalkdAdmin started as a tool to support [Awespot](http://awespot.org/) development and administration.

It is based on [Pheanstalk](https://github.com/pda/pheanstalk/).

You can submit bugs or feature requests on [this page](https://github.com/mnapoli/phpBeanstalkdAdmin/issues/new).
